name: Touch of Flame
description: Your grenades ignite targets, causing them to burn over time and deal increased damage.

name: Heat Rises
description: Consuming your grenade allows you to fire weapons while gliding and extends airborne time.

name: Icarus Dash
description: Dodge while airborne with a double tap of the jump button. Heat Rises grants an additional dodge.

name: Electrostatic Mind
description: Arc ability or jolted enemy defeats grant Ionic Traces that return ability energy.

name: Arc Soul
description: Gain an Arc Soul when using Rift, amplified, or casting your Super that fires at enemies.

name: Lightning Surge
description: Activate your charged melee while sliding to transform into a ball of lightning that jolts targets.

name: Feed the Void
description: Void ability kills activate Devour, healing you and granting grenade energy.

name: Child of the Old Gods
description: Cast Rift to summon a Void Soul that weakens and drains targets.

name: Chaos Accelerant
description: Hold the grenade button to overcharge your grenades for increased damage and effects.

name: Bleak Watcher
description: Convert your grenade into a Stasis turret that slows and freezes nearby targets.

name: Iceflare Bolts
description: Shattering frozen targets creates seekers that track and freeze other enemies.

name: Glacial Harvest
description: Freezing targets creates Stasis shards around the frozen target.

name: Frostpulse
description: Casting Rift sends out a wave that freezes nearby targets.

name: Mindspun Invocation
description: Grapple to targets grants melee energy. Consuming a Tangle grants class ability energy.

name: Weaver's Call
description: Casting Rift creates Threadlings that seek out and attack enemies.

name: The Wanderer
description: Destroying Tangles creates a Rift at their location. Your Rifts grant you and allies Woven Mail.

name: Knockout
description: Critically wounding targets or breaking shields increases melee damage and restores health.

name: Touch of Thunder
description: Your Arc grenades have enhanced functionality and can be deployed multiple times.

name: Juggernaut
description: While sprinting, you build up a frontal shield that blocks incoming damage.

name: Thruster
description: Dodge in your direction of movement while airborne. Breaking shields jolts nearby targets.

name: Controlled Demolition
description: Hitting targets with Void damage causes them to explode when killed.

name: Offensive Bulwark
description: While you have an overshield, your grenades charge faster and melee damage is increased.

name: Bastion
description: Cast Barricade to grant you and nearby allies an overshield. You deal increased melee damage.

name: Sol Invictus
description: Solar ability kills restore health and create Sunspots that grant restoration when standing in them.

name: Roaring Flames
description: Solar ignitions and final blows increase your Super and ability damage. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Consecration
description: Slide then melee to launch into the air and slam down, creating a wave of Solar energy.

name: Tectonic Harvest
description: Shattering a Stasis crystal creates Stasis shards that grant melee energy when picked up.

name: Howl of the Storm
description: Slide then melee to create a wave of Stasis that freezes targets and creates Stasis crystals.

name: Cryoclasm
description: Slide further and shatter Stasis crystals and frozen targets you slide into.

name: Diamond Lance
description: Shatter or defeat frozen targets to create a Stasis lance that can be thrown to freeze.

name: Into the Fray
description: Destroying a Tangle grants you and nearby allies Woven Mail and grants grenade energy.

name: Flechette Storm
description: While sliding or immediately after a slide, activate your charged melee to launch Strand projectiles.

name: Drengr's Lash
description: Activate your class ability to snap a devastating Strand whip that suspends targets.

name: Banner of War
description: Defeat targets with abilities to plant your banner, granting restoration and melee damage.

name: Knock 'Em Down
description: Golden Gun precision hits and ignitions grant bonus Super energy. Golden Gun has increased duration.

name: Gunpowder Gamble
description: Defeat targets with Solar ignitions to charge an explosive Solar projectile.

name: On Your Mark
description: Precision final blows grant you and allies increased weapon reload and handling for a short time.

name: Flow State
description: Defeating jolted targets makes you amplified. While amplified, dodging reloads your equipped weapon.

name: Tempest Strike
description: Slide then melee to launch a wave of Arc energy forward, damaging and jolting targets.

name: Lethal Current
description: After dodging, your melee lunge range is increased and your next melee strike jolts the target.

name: Trapper's Ambush
description: Activate Quickfall to perform a dive that makes you and nearby allies invisible and weakens enemies.

name: Stylish Executioner
description: Defeating weakened, suppressed, or volatile targets grants invisibility and Truesight.

name: Vanishing Step
description: Dodging makes you invisible and grants you and nearby allies damage resistance.

name: Grim Harvest
description: Defeating frozen or slowed targets creates Stasis shards that grant melee energy.

name: Winter's Shroud
description: Dodging slows nearby targets. Slow dodges also grant you and nearby allies increased damage.

name: Touch of Winter
description: Your grenades have enhanced functionality, creating additional freezing effects.

name: Shatterdive
description: While airborne, press melee to quickly descend and shatter nearby frozen targets and Stasis crystals.

name: Threaded Specter
description: Activating your class ability leaves behind a decoy that draws enemy fire and explodes.

name: Widow's Silk
description: Your grapple creates a persistent tangle that can be picked up by allies and exploded.

name: Whirling Maelstrom
description: Destroying Tangles grants you bonus class ability energy and grants Woven Mail.

name: Ensnaring Slam
description: While airborne, press the charged melee button to slam down and suspend all nearby targets.

name: Hellion
description: Send out a Solar mortar that scorches targets on impact.

name: Unbreakable
description: Hold your class ability input to form a Void shield that drains energy. On release, Void Overshield is consumed and converted into melee energy.

name: Ascension
description: While airborne, activate Class Ability to twirl upwards, jolting and damaging targets below. Amplifies you and nearby allies.

name: On the Prowl
description: Defeating weakened targets grants Invisibility. While Invisible, your next melee attack weakens targets.

name: Storm's Keep
description: Breaking enemy shields or defeating targets with Arc damage creates Ionic Traces. Collecting Ionic Traces blinds nearby targets.

name: Weavewalk
description: Activate your class ability to draw Strand energy from your surroundings, gaining Woven Mail and becoming harder to slow or freeze.

name: Ionic Sentry
description: Defeating targets with Arc damage or your abilities charges an Arc turret. Hold grenade to deploy it. The turret fires lightning bolts at nearby enemies.
